languages.text: "Ха, старик уж точно не расчитывал на такой исход — денюжки теперь мои! Не волнуйся, доченька, папочка тебе поможет распорядиться наследством как надо".

traits.locale_text: "Ха, старик уж точно не расчитывал на такой исход — денюжки теперь мои! Не волнуйся, доченька, папочка тебе поможет распорядиться наследством как надо".

languages.text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."
languages.original_text: "Ха, старик уж точно не расчитывал на такой исход — денюжки теперь мои! Не волнуйся, доченька, папочка тебе поможет распорядиться наследством как надо".

traits.locale_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."
"Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

"Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

languages.text: 「ハッ、あの爺さんもこんなことになるとは思ってもいなかったろうよ。この金は俺のだ！心配しなくていいぞ、父さんが、お爺ちゃんの財産を上手く使う手伝いをしてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: 「ハッ、あの爺さんもこんなことになるとは思ってもいなかったろうよ。この金は俺のだ！心配しなくていいぞ、父さんが、お爺ちゃんの財産を上手く使う手伝いをしてやろう」

languages.text: “哈！黄金王座在上，那个老鬼肯定想不到，所有的钱都是我的了！别担心，我的宝贝儿，老爸会帮你把你爷爷的钱花在刀刃上。”
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: “哈！黄金王座在上，那个老鬼肯定想不到，所有的钱都是我的了！别担心，我的宝贝儿，老爸会帮你把你爷爷的钱花在刀刃上。”

languages.text: « Ha, le vieillard ne s'attendait certainement pas à ça... L'argent est à moi ! Ne t'en fais pas, ma chérie, Papa fera bon usage des richesses de ton grand-père. »
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: « Ha, le vieillard ne s'attendait certainement pas à ça... L'argent est à moi ! Ne t'en fais pas, ma chérie, Papa fera bon usage des richesses de ton grand-père. »

languages.text: «Ja, por el Trono, seguro que el viejo no se esperaba eso. ¡El dinero es mío! No te preocupes, cielo, papá te ayudará a dar buen uso a las riquezas de tu abuelo».
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: «Ja, por el Trono, seguro que el viejo no se esperaba eso. ¡El dinero es mío! No te preocupes, cielo, papá te ayudará a dar buen uso a las riquezas de tu abuelo».

languages.text: "Hah, das hatte der alte Mann garantiert nicht erwartet ... das Geld gehört mir! Keine Sorge, Schätzchen. Daddy wird dir helfen, den Reichtum deines Großvaters gut zu nutzen."
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: "Hah, das hatte der alte Mann garantiert nicht erwartet ... das Geld gehört mir! Keine Sorge, Schätzchen. Daddy wird dir helfen, den Reichtum deines Großvaters gut zu nutzen."

languages.text: "Heh, ihtiyarın bunu hiç beklemediğine Taht üstüne yemin edebilirim. Para benim! Endişelenme canım, babacığın dedenin servetini güzel amaçlarla kullanmana yardım edecek."
languages.original_text: "Hah, the old man sure as Throne didn't expect this — the money is mine! Don't worry, sweetheart, Daddy will help you put your grandpa's riches to good use."

traits.locale_text: "Heh, ihtiyarın bunu hiç beklemediğine Taht üstüne yemin edebilirim. Para benim! Endişelenme canım, babacığın dedenin servetini güzel amaçlar için kullanacak."
